title: Free Coffee & Snacks At Panera Today [Freebies]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
While we most certainly recommend taking advantage of CREMA’s free coffee today, some of us just aren’t lucky enough to work near downtown. For us unfortunate folk stuck in Cool Springs (not that we’re bitter), Panera is offering free coffee all day today as well. In addition to free coffee, they will be launching their new menu of breakfast foods, with plentiful samples all day. We just may drop in for breakfast… at lunch time.
